name: Divide & Slime
description:
A fast-paced Clicker!  Made for the GCS Game Jam in November 2019

Tap or click the screen to split slimes up until they disappear.  Kill as many as you can before they overflow the area!

There are many types of slimes that can appear, some are larger and can split more times, others are really tough so you have to tap them multiple times.  

Different landscapes will sometimes contain different kinds of slimes!
